domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump Another distraction. 114,000 dead Americans from your COVID-19 response, on your watch, and rising. How many more dead Americans are you prepared to wear as a "badge of honour?" When will you start to take responsibility? And you rate your response 10/10.
